amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate the requirement in the bill to fast-track analyses under the National Environmental Policy Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 114-128 to eliminate the requirement to fast-track analyses under the National Environmental Policy Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dingell amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 223 (Roll No. 264).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Dingell amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 223 (Roll No. 264).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mrs. Dingell.
